thread.section_title: Hotel de Vendome - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Going the extra step - Review
thread.title_full: Going the extra step - Review of Hotel de Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: John M
title: Going the extra step - Review
text:
I've reviewed this property where we stay twice a year before. This trip required extraordinary help, and the staff was simply spectacular. Spouse broke an ankle within the first hours upon arrival in Paris. Hotel helped vet and manage medical attention, travel connections, assistance on the property, procurement of medicine, etc. Can't say enough good things about the kind, genuine, personal attention.
Room Tip: 05 stack suites overlook both Rue Fauborg and the intersection of Rue de Castiglione See more room tips
